data.name: Royal Skeleton Pants
data.description: Bone leg armor adorned with gold and enchanted with royal magic. Macabre yet magnificent.

effects.description: Adds 150 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5 Haste to its stats when equipped. The haste reduces the cooldown of a fight.
Adds 17% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 17% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 7% Earth Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 7% Water Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Royal Skeleton Armor
data.description: A skeletal chestpiece gilded with gold and powerful enchantments. A grim testament to luxury.

effects.description: Adds 150 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 6% Air Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 6% Fire Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Royal Skeleton Helmet
data.description: A skull helmet decorated with gold and arcane symbols. Both terrifying and awe-inspiring.

effects.description: Adds 160 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20 Wisdom to its stats when equipped. Each point of wisdom increases your xp in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 wisdom)

data.name: Elderwood Staff
data.description: A staff carved from ancient wood, topped with a crystal focus. Channels both fire and water magic.

effects.description: Adds 40 Water Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 40 Fire Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Obsidian Battleaxe
data.description: A massive battleaxe with blades of volcanic glass. Heavy to wield, but devastating in combat.

effects.description: Adds 80 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds -25 to the maximum number of items in the inventory when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Antidote
data.description: A potent medicine that neutralizes poison. The bitter taste is worth the relief it brings.

effects.description: At the beginning of the turn, if the character has at least one poison on him, removes 50 poison damage.

data.name: Prospecting Amulet
data.description: An amulet that seems to pull its wearer toward hidden treasures. Invaluable for treasure hunters.

effects.description: Adds 100 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 100 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)
Adds 5% Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.description: A bow humming with magical energy. Its arrows seem to find their targets with uncanny precision.

effects.description: Adds 53 Fire Attack to its stats when equipped.

Adds 35% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.description: A macabre ring made from polished bone and adorned with gold. Despite its grim appearance, it grants potent benefits.

data.name: Owlbear Claw
data.description: A massive claw from the fearsome owlbear. Sharp enough to tear through armor with ease.

data.name: Flying Boots

data.name: Conjurer Cloak
data.description: A magnificent cloak worn by skilled magic users. Its patterns seem to shift and change when you're not looking directly at them.

data.name: Life Crystal Shard
data.description: A fragment of a larger crystal that pulses with life energy. Small plants seem to grow faster when kept near it. These shards can be exchanged for a powerful item.

data.name: Health Splash Potion
data.description: A vibrant red potion in a breakable flask. When thrown, it shatters and releases a healing mist that rapidly mends wounds of those caught in its cloud.

effects.description: Restores 150 HP at the start of the turn to another character who has lost the most health if that character has less than 50% of their health points remaining.

data.name: Lich Tomb Key
data.description: A bone-white key that radiates cold unnatural energy. Inscribed with necromantic symbols, it unlocks the sealed entrance to an ancient lich's burial chamber.

data.name: Cursed Book
data.description: A mysterious tome covered in strange symbols. The pages seem to turn by themselves occasionally.

data.name: Corrupted Stone
data.description: A stone pulsing with dark energy. Essential for crafting items with unique magical properties.

data.name: Malefic Cloth
data.description: Cloth imbued with malevolent energy. Feels cold to the touch but enhances magical items tremendously.

data.name: Strange Ore
data.description: An unusual ore with shifting patterns on its surface. Seems to defy the laws of nature.

data.name: Diamond
data.description: The hardest known substance, with unmatched clarity and magical potential. Extremely valuable.

data.name: Magic Wood
data.description: Wood from trees that grew in areas saturated with magic. Glows faintly and is perfect for magical items.

data.name: Strangold Bar
data.description: A mysterious alloy of gold and strange ore. Has unusual properties that defy conventional metallurgy.

data.name: Magical Plank
data.description: A plank made from magic wood. Seems to shimmer with arcane energy and is perfect for magical crafting.

data.name: Cursed Hat
data.description: A hat imbued with dark magic. Wearing it grants tremendous fire power but may have unexpected consequences.

effects.description: Adds 170 HP to its stats when equipped.
